In this digital age, do you think modern inventions have made our lives simpler, or more complex and dangerous? Discuss with examples…

                        Modern Invention have made our lives not only simpler but also very interesting mostly for the youths. It gave lots of easy ways of living than before. In olden days people use to walk for miles, and if they want to reach a destination they have to walk at least 3 to 4 days. But now within an hour we can reach abroad with the help of Airways which resembles Modern Invention like Kingfishers, JETS etc. 

                         When we come to communication previously it was very difficult in passing messages but at present generation within a fraction of seconds messages are being conveyed with the help of SMS,E-mails(Internet).This made not only the common man to communicate but   the businessmen's,Schools and Colleges etc. This modern invention of internet and mobiles made the way of living very fast as it saves the time and result of work will be very productivity and also creativity.

                         As India is having with illiterate people so the style of living will be difficult for such people like in handling with nets etc. Nowadays lots of work like paying of bills, Booking tickets and all are done with internet. Without internet not even a single job is completed. Even information's are collected with the help of net. 

                         Even in Hospitals the modern invention is needed in curing diseases for example Laser treatments, CT scanning and still more which makes to feel the patients satisfy of this inventions. Modern Invention is mostly grabbed by the youths as they are interested in new things in that age. So they not only interested but also want to do inventions on new things.

                          Till now all the discussion was related to the style of living , now when we come to hygiene subjects many researchers have innovated lot of safety for the people in the way of maintaining health. While coming to drinking we have many innovative products in purifying the water especially like RO's and UV's which is provided by few companies like Aqua sure, Kent etc. This made even the middle class people to purchase.Such type of innovaton which is not only useful but makes the life of the people very healthy.

                            So overall living style is completely dependent on innovation.This can be seen in purchasing of Mobiles.Yongsters purchase mobile which has lots of features recently there was Nokia but now Samsung took its place. Its all because of Modern Innovation. From this example itself it is understood that there is lots of need for the innovation, mostly to the Customers which makes the innovators to innovate their products.

                              This Modern Innovation becomes complex to those who never used of these innovations. And it becomes dangerous in using  passwords, secret numbers  etc. This application can be observed in ATM's .This makes easy for a person to withdraw money anywhere, anytime but at the same time it makes it dangerous if the password is known to other.

                              Finally according to me the "MODERN INNOVATION" have made our lives simpler than before where each and every one are attracted towards the innovation products and wants to be the unique person in using such innovative products.
